long_description: A compact, lightweight stroller for daily activities, the BOB Motion Stroller easily transitions from strolling to storage with its 1-hand, quick-fold mechanism and automatic frame lock. Made with a tough aluminum frame and durable fabric for lasting use. Small-diameter swiveling front wheels allow for exceptional maneuverability; wheels can be locked forward for increased stability when the terrain becomes demanding. High-impact polymer rear wheels are outfitted with inflatable tires that roll over everything from city streets to dirt trails. Independent suspension system smooths the ride. Linked parking brake secures both rear wheels. Padded and adjustable reclining seat; 5-point padded harness. Large multi-position canopy; large ventilation window. Large undercarriage cargo basket. Padded and adjustable handlebar. Integrated CLICK & GO adapter system works with matching BOB B-Safe Infant Car Seats and all Britax infant car seats using the CLICK & GO system (seats not inclued).
short_description: A compact, lightweight stroller for daily activities, the BOB Motion Stroller easily transitions from strolling to storage with its 1-hand, quick-fold mechanism and automatic frame lock.
